Title: Thelma & Louise Except Thelma Is Linda
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Jon Schroeder
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Linda could lose her position as the leader of the Wagstaff bake sale when Louise gets in trouble at school.
